summary: An Englishman on a Ruritarian holiday must impersonate the king when the rightful monarch, a distant cousin, is drugged and kidnapped.
cast: Ronald Colman|Madeleine Carroll|C. Aubrey Smith|Raymond Massey|Mary Astor|David Niven|Douglas Fairbanks Jr.|Montagu Love|Philip Sleeman|Eleanor Wesselhoeft|Florence Roberts|Torben Meyer|Arthur Byron|Francis Ford|Margaret Tallichet|Wilhelm von Brincken|Evelyn Beresford|Ricardo Lord Cezon|Spencer Charters|Sally Conlin|D'Arcy Corrigan|Bonnie Gaye Cowen|Alexander D'Arcy|Billy Diamond|Ralph Faulkner|Billy Finnegan|Byron Foulger|Charles K. director: Directors: John Cromwell, W.S. Van Dyke (uncredited)
title: El prisionero de Zenda
